Course Content: This course aims at teaching the values and principles of agile software development teams and the agile practices for successful delivery of software products. From this perspective, the course covers a wide range of ASD methods and practices in relation to different areas and specific processes of software development. The primary ASD methods that will be covered in this course will include Scrum, Extreme Programming (XP), Test Driven Development (TDD), KanBan, and Disciplined Agile Delivery (DAD). The course not only covers the Agile Methods and Practices, but also introduces how to get started implementing Agile in software projects.
